body:
Based on yesterday's IRC conversation, it sounds like there are two API solves for this:

1. Change the existing paginated endpoint to allow returning the entire list in one call
1. Add filters to the 'extension listing' endpoint to allow text search (like on the Recipes Listing)

If @marcrowo can handle one of those, this can be wrapped up. I'm a fan of the `filters` approach since it adds more features to other parts of the site for the same amount of work.
